name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Kotlin Multiplatform Developer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Kotlin**, **Kotlin Multiplatform**, **RxJava**, and **Coroutines**, with a strong understanding of **Clean Architecture** and **SOLID** principles. Skilled in implementing **MVI** architecture and utilizing **Koin** for dependency injection. Experienced with **OkHttp** for HTTP requests and adept in using **Compose** and **Compose Multiplatform** for modern UI development.

Demonstrated expertise in automated testing using **JUnit4** and **Mockk**, with a commitment to high-quality code standards through **code review** practices supported by tools like **Gerrit**. Knowledgeable in **cryptography** best practices for secure application development. In addition to these skills, I have hands-on experience with full-stack development technologies, including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, and deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**. Proven ability to develop **AI/ML** solutions that enhance predictive analytics and real-time processing.
